meaningMnemonic: This is an adverb, but it has the same meaning (basically) as the kanji. It means <vocabulary>certainly</vocabulary>, and it can also mean <vocabulary>surely</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this one is <vocabulary>certainly</vocabulary> weird. To remember the reading for this word, just think how you're certain that if you s<reading>tash</reading> the treasure, nobody will find it here.
